name: Trouble City Pocket Mission
description:
TROUBLE CITY HAS A PROBLEM AND THERE’S ONLY ONE MAN WHO CAN SOLVE IT. 

After a violent quake emanates from Trouble City’s PARADISE CO. Toy Factory, special operative JACK MISSION is tasked with infiltrating the abandoned complex on a one-man mission. As JACK, you must EXPLORE, SCROUNGE for supplies and SURVIVE against the machinations of a troubled inventor’s dream-—turned horrible nightmare... 

-Classic top-down survival horror, puzzle solving ACTION! 

-Investigate a dilapidated factory and find the truth behind the strange and ominous PARADISE CO. 

-Meet and defeat WEIRD AND WILD characters only a madman could dream up: some could aid you on your mission. Some will try to vehemently try to murder you. SENTIENT TOY ROBOTS, LUDICROUS OOZE MEN and MORE! 

-16 OUTLANDISH COLOURS! HIGH-TECH, HIGH-BROW, HIGH-FALLUTIN, CHARMING GRAPHICS that fit in the palm of your hand!

Follow Sky Pirate Studios on Twitter
Sky Pirate Studios Patreon for behind the scenes! I will upload Trouble City design docs and sketchbook pages there.

We used community music for Trouble City from here: https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets

Thank you to the following creators for making you work available!
